articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in France 
    Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) --  Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Juche Philosophy Is an Original Revolutionary Philosophy" was published in pamphlet on March 30 by the Edition Democratique Publishing House of France.
 The work, issued on July 26, Juche 85 (1996), comprehensively elucidates the originality of the Juche philosophy and its superiority to the preceding philosophy of the working class.    
 And it makes it clear that the Juche philosophy serves as the revolutionary philosophy, political philosophy of the Workers' Party of Korea and outlines matters of principle that should be taken into hands in the study and explanation of the Juche philosophy.

articles.content:
Poster of 6th Kimilsungia Festival Released 
    Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- A poster of the 6th Kimilsungia Festival to be held splendidly on the occasion of the Day of the Sun was released.
 Beautifully depicted there are immortal Kimilsungias in full bloom. Also seen there are letters reading "The 6th Kimilsungia Festival", "The Day of the Sun" and "Commemoration" and the festival flag.  Written in the poster are letters that the festival will be held at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition from April 13 to 22, Juche 93 (2004).

Paek Nam Sun Meets New Australian Ambassador
articles.content:
Credentials Presented to Kim Yong Nam
    Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Alan William Thomas, new Australian ambassador e. p. to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present were Kim Yong Il, vice minister of Foreign Affairs, and staff members of the Australian embassy.    
 After receiving the credentials, the president conversed with the ambassador.

Paek Nam Sun Meets New Australian Ambassador
    Pyongyang, April 5 (KCNA) -- Paek Nam Sun, foreign minister of the DPRK, met and conversed with Alan William Thomas, new Australian ambassador e. p. to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him today.
